subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Yes Margaret, 56 allophones are probably not enough to form speech. One
could test this by trying to form speech by manually assembling some of
these remaining allophones using Audition's play list. Probably this
would be much more difficult than with the full set of 72 allophones.

Stefan

-- 

am 04.04.2008 um 02:52 Uhr schriebst Du (u.a.):
am 04.04.2008 um 02:52 Uhr schrieben Sie (u.a.):

> Hi Stefan.  I'm thinking too much has been cut from this one.  Ran a couple sessions with 
> it.  I'm not getting anything (not that I get something every time with the other 72- but 
> nothing sounds even remotely like word formation with the 56 file.)

> Margaret
